title: Structural Hardscaping & Patios
intro: The backbone of your outdoor space. Contractors engineer retaining walls and patios that handle Austin's slopes and expansive soils.
highlights: Limestone and block retaining walls engineered for slopes
Paver, flagstone, and concrete patios designed for drainage
Custom stone steps and terracing for hill country lots
Pool coping and decking that stays cool in summer

avgCost.notes: Patios start around $15-25/sqft. Retaining walls vary by height and access.

faqs.q: Do I need a permit for a retaining wall?
faqs.a: In Austin, walls over 4 feet tall require a permit and structural engineering. Partners handle this coordination for you.

faqs.q: What is the best material for a patio?
faqs.a: Pavers are ideal for Texas clay soils because they are flexible and won't crack like poured concrete often does when the ground shifts.
